Journal Story:
Born and raised about one hour north of Avery Island La., the place where Tabasco sauce is made, that is why I decided on "Tabasco" as my trail name.I plan on doing a long distance sobo hike from Damascus to Amicalola Falls, starting around April 1st. 
Sobo--south bound.
Been doing some practice hike around Woodworth, La. and Bayou Chicot, getting ready for my Appalachian hike.
Heard about another hiking trail that is somewhat strenuous, and has several waterfalls, if time permits, I may go check it out.
Food all packed for the first leg of my journey. Still on schedule to start in April. Thank you Lord.
Destination: Abingdon shelter. Temperature mid 60's and raining.
